item.title: Rubbish spread all over carpark and on to surround g streets, 30th November
item.description:
The rubbish left and then has been picked over and then spread around the carpark and some of the surrounding streets. A real eyesore for people do I g their Christmas shopping! Mess has been present side at least last Sunday so over 1 week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Orangery Lane, Eltham

item.title: This vehicle is parked here for a few weeks already and hasn't been moved for over a month at least., 30th November
item.description:
The vehicle is parked on the same spot for over a month. It parked near the bike spot and is taking up too much space (more than 1.5 parking spaces). This vehicle has rubbish in it for a long time and I didn't see anyone using this vehicle for over a month
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranwich Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned, write-off bike, 30th November
item.description:

item.title: Very large pothole, 30th November
item.description:
There is a very large pothole as you turn left from Petts Wood Road onto Tudor Way. It has grown considerably over the last couple of days and is very likely to cause damage to vehicle wheels. It's causing vehicles to swerve into oncoming traffic to avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 127, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo every day outside our house, 30th November
item.description:
Persistent dog fouling on Elderfield Road outside our house (29). My children have stepped in it a number of times and I am sick and tired of cleaning trainers covered in other peoples dog poo. We need signage, more dog poo bins and fines PLEASE

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elderfield Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belcroft Close, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Manhole cover loose and noisy, 30th November
item.description:
Manhole cover in lane 1 outside Pret a Manger, at junction with Warwick Row is loose and noisy when vehicles pass over. This is disruptive as it is close to offices and a hotel.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Bressenden Place, Victoria, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees need pollarding, pruning, 30th November
item.description:
Seems to be quite a few years since trees were pruned. The growth is excessive and leaf fall potentially dangerous due to slipping. I noticed that some trees at the Toyota end of road have been cut back. During the summer the leaf canopy nearly covers the road. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridgeway Drive, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath, 30th November
item.description:
Between 25 Capstone Road down to Downham Road. Area is getting worse for dumping. Footpath blocked by couch. Items where on floor dump into area of beding which is not Co Op area but Lewisham as it's over the fencing. Area where shops have large whee bins over flowing with bins liners on ground.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Delivery Vehicles Only, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
